t: Amazon.com: Lion Brand Yarn Hometown, Quick Bonus Bundle Yarn, Spice Market
s: I have made dog coats and cowls with this yarn. It is very soft, with even stitching and feel much more woolly than its actual content. Lion Brand is new to me although I have been a compulsive knitter for 25 years, I love it and am so glad I found it.
